meanings.definition: Brolgas: a large Australian crane with a gray body and a red head
meanings.sent1: The brolgas gracefully danced in the wetlands.
meanings.sent2: We spotted a group of brolgas by the river.
meanings.sent3: The brolgas seemed to be having a meeting by the water.
meanings.sent4: The brolgas stood tall like elegant statues in the marsh.
meanings.sent5: The brolgas' distinctive red heads make them easy to identify.

meanings.definition: Brolgas: plural form of brolga, referring to more than one of the bird species
meanings.sent1: Look at all those brolgas flying together in the sky!
meanings.sent2: The brolgas nested in the tall grass near the lake.
meanings.sent3: It was a brolgas convention up in the trees.
meanings.sent4: The field was filled with brolgas, a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: The brolgas' wings flapped rhythmically as they soared above the plains.
